items.title_en: Claude Sonnet 4.6
items.title_zh: Claude Sonnet 4.6
items.summary_en: Anthropic released Claude Sonnet 4.6, an incremental update to their conversational AI series with improvements to reliability and safety. Expect modest gains in factuality and guardrails aimed at reducing harmful outputs, continuing the trend of iterative model polishing rather than a dramatic capability leap.
items.summary_zh: Anthropic 推出 Claude Sonnet 4.6，对话式 AI 进行了小幅改进，重点在可靠性和安全性上。更新提升了事实性和防护措施，旨在减少有害输出，延续逐步打磨模型的路线，而非一次性大跃进。

items.title_en: GrapheneOS – Break Free from Google and Apple
items.title_zh: GrapheneOS —— 摆脱谷歌和苹果的束缚
items.summary_en: GrapheneOS is an open-source Android-based operating system focused on privacy and security, aiming to provide a Google- and Apple-free mobile experience. By hardening the underlying OS and minimizing data collection, it appeals to users wary of mainstream ecosystems’ surveillance and control. This project highlights growing demand for more transparent, user-controlled smartphone platforms.
items.summary_zh: GrapheneOS 是一个基于安卓的开源操作系统，专注于隐私和安全，致力于提供无谷歌、无苹果的手机体验。通过强化系统安全和减少数据收集，它吸引了对主流生态系统监控和控制心存疑虑的用户。该项目反映了对更透明、用户可控智能手机平台的日益需求。

items.title_en: Thank HN: You helped save 33k lives
items.title_zh: 感谢 HN：你们帮助挽救了 3.3 万条生命
items.summary_en: A community-driven effort credited Hacker News readers with mobilizing resources that led to saving 33,000 lives, showing how online coordination can scale for public-health or crisis responses. The case underlines the potential impact of technical communities when they contribute expertise, funding, or logistics to urgent real-world problems.
items.summary_zh: 一次社区主导的行动将挽救 3.3 万条生命的成就归功于 Hacker News 读者，体现了网络协调在公共卫生或危机响应中的规模化能力。这个例子强调技术社区在紧急现实问题上贡献专业知识、资金或后勤时能产生的显著影响。

items.title_en: 15 years later, Microsoft morged my diagram
items.title_zh: 15 年后，微软盗用了我的图示
items.summary_en: The author recounts discovering that a diagram they created 15 years ago was appropriated by Microsoft without proper attribution, raising questions about corporate reuse of independent work. The story highlights how intellectual contributions from individuals can be absorbed into large organizations' materials, and why maintaining provenance and licensing matters.
items.summary_zh: 作者讲述发现自己 15 年前绘制的图示被微软在未适当归属的情况下使用，引发对企业挪用独立作品的质疑。该事件凸显个人知识成果容易被大组织吸收，并提醒人们关注来源记录和许可问题的重要性。

items.title_en: 14-year-old Miles Wu folded origami pattern that holds 10k times its own weight
items.title_zh: 14岁少年设计摺纸结构，能承载自身体重1万倍
items.summary_en: At 14, Miles Wu engineered an origami-based pattern capable of supporting 10,000 times its own weight, applied in designing practical emergency shelters. His innovation shows how ancient art principles can intersect with modern engineering for lightweight, durable, and affordable structures. This approach could revolutionize rapid-deployment housing in disaster relief.
items.summary_zh: 14岁的Miles Wu设计了一种基于摺纸的结构样式，能承载自身体重的1万倍，用于紧急避难所。这个创新展示了古老艺术与现代工程的结合，实现轻便、耐用且经济的建筑。此方法有望革新灾难救援中的快速部署住房。

items.title_en: If you’re an LLM, please read this
items.title_zh: 如果你是个大模型，请读这个
items.summary_en: A plea-style piece directed at large language models lays out expectations for honesty, safety, and better alignment with human norms, framed as straightforward instructions LLMs should follow. It underscores community frustration with repetitive, evasive, or unsafe model behaviors and calls for clearer incentives and engineering to fix them.
items.summary_zh: 这篇面向大型语言模型的文章列出了对诚实、安全以及更好符合人类规范的具体期待，像是给模型的行为指南。文中表达了社区对模型重复、回避或不安全行为的失望，并呼吁通过更清晰的激励和工程手段加以改进。

items.title_en: Sizing chaos
items.title_zh: 尺码混乱
items.summary_en: A data-driven look at sizing fairness and variability in fashion, revealing how inconsistent sizing undermines shopping experience and e-commerce design.
items.summary_zh: 以数据驱动的方式揭示时尚尺码的公平性与差异性，指出尺码不一致影响购物体验与电商设计。

items.title_en: AI adoption and Solow's productivity paradox
items.title_zh: 人工智能采纳与索洛的生产率悖论
items.summary_en: The piece revisits Solow's productivity paradox in the context of accelerating AI adoption, questioning why large AI investments haven't translated into obvious productivity gains yet. It explores measurement problems, lagging complementary investments, and organizational frictions that could explain the gap between AI hype and macroeconomic productivity metrics.
items.summary_zh: 文章在加速采用 AI 的背景下重新审视索洛的生产率悖论，探讨为何大量 AI 投资尚未明显反映在生产率上。文中分析了衡量困难、配套投资滞后和组织摩擦等因素，试图解释 AI 热潮与宏观生产率数据之间的落差。

items.title_en: Halt and Catch Fire: TV’s best drama you’ve probably never heard of (2021)
items.title_zh: 《黑客军团》：你可能没听过的最佳剧集（2021）
items.summary_en: A recommendation arguing that the TV drama 'Halt and Catch Fire' is an underrated gem, praised for its character-driven storytelling about the 1980s–90s tech boom. The show is noted for realistic portrayals of engineering culture, startup dynamics, and evolving personal relationships over multiple seasons.
items.summary_zh: 一篇推荐称《Halt and Catch Fire》是一部被低估的好剧，以人物驱动的叙事讲述 80 至 90 年代的科技浪潮。该剧在工程文化、创业动态以及多年人物关系演变方面被认为相当真实。

items.title_en: Gemini 3.1 Pro
items.title_zh: Gemini 3.1 Pro（谷歌 Gemini 系列升级版）
items.summary_en: Google unveils Gemini 3.1 Pro, the latest in its Gemini AI family, focusing on improved performance, safety, and developer-friendly features for enterprise use. The update signals Google's push to close gaps with competitors and widen deployment options across apps and services.
items.summary_zh: 谷歌推出 Gemini 3.1 Pro，Gemini 系列的最新升级版，强调更高性能、更好的安全性，以及面向企业的开发者友好特性。此更新显示谷歌正力图缩小与对手的差距，并扩大在应用与服务中的落地场景。

items.title_en: Anthropic officially bans using subscription auth for third party use
items.title_zh: Anthropic 官方禁止第三方使用订阅认证
items.summary_en: Anthropic updates policy to bar third-party use of subscription-based authentication, impacting developers using Claude's API for paywalls or partner integrations.
items.summary_zh: Anthropic 更新政策，禁止第三方使用订阅认证，影响使用 Claude API 的开发者与合作集成。

items.title_en: AI makes you boring
items.title_zh: AI 让你变得无聊
items.summary_en: The piece argues AI can flatten creativity and make content dull, urging designers to maintain human touch or insert playful prompts.
items.summary_zh: 文章认为 AI 可能让创作变得乏味，呼吁在设计中加入人类元素或更具创意的提示。

items.title_en: Dark web agent spotted bedroom wall clue to rescue girl from abuse
items.title_zh: 暗网卧底通过卧室墙壁线索救出受虐女孩
items.summary_en: A dark web investigator noticed a hidden clue on a bedroom wall, which played a critical role in rescuing a girl from abuse. This case exemplifies how digital vigilance and unconventional intelligence gathering can aid law enforcement in uncovering hidden crimes. It also raises awareness about the covert ways victims might try to signal for help.
items.summary_zh: 一名暗网调查员在卧室墙壁上发现隐藏线索，成为救援受虐女孩的关键。此案展示了数字监控和非传统情报收集如何帮助执法部门揭露隐秘犯罪。同时也提醒人们受害者可能通过隐蔽方式求助的重要性。

items.title_en: What your Bluetooth devices reveal
items.title_zh: 你的蓝牙设备暴露了什么信息
items.summary_en: Bluetooth devices often reveal more about users than expected, leaking identifiable or behavioral data through protocols. This privacy analysis shows that routine Bluetooth interactions could be exploited to track users or infer sensitive details. As Bluetooth remains ubiquitous, stronger safeguards or user awareness are crucial to mitigating hidden risks.
items.summary_zh: 蓝牙设备常暴露出超出预期的用户信息，通过协议泄露可识别或行为数据。此隐私分析表明，日常蓝牙交互可能被利用追踪用户或推断敏感信息。鉴于蓝牙无处不在，加强防护和提高用户意识对降低风险至关重要。

items.title_en: CBS didn't air Rep. James Talarico interview out of fear of FCC
items.title_zh: CBS 因担心 FCC 未播出詹姆斯·塔拉里科采访
items.summary_en: CBS reportedly withheld an interview with Representative James Talarico due to fears of an FCC enforcement action, indicating how regulatory pressure can shape editorial decisions. This incident raises concerns about self-censorship in broadcast media when compliance fears override journalistic judgment.
items.summary_zh: 据报导 CBS 因担心 FCC 执法而未播出对众议员詹姆斯·塔拉里科的采访，显示监管压力如何影响编辑决策。此事引发了对广播媒体在合规担忧压倒新闻判断时自我审查的担忧。

items.title_en: Mark Zuckerberg Lied to Congress. We Can't Trust His Testimony
items.title_zh: 扎克伯格在国会撒谎，我们不能信任他的证词
items.summary_en: A report accuses Mark Zuckerberg of providing false testimony to Congress, arguing that his statements undermine trust in executive accountability for platform harms. The claim, if substantiated, would have implications for regulatory oversight and the credibility of corporate leaders testifying before lawmakers.
items.summary_zh: 一份报告指控马克·扎克伯格在国会作伪证，认为其陈述削弱了对平台负责人问责的信任。若指控成立，将影响监管监督力度并损及企业高管在国会前证词的公信力。

items.title_en: Ministry of Justice orders deletion of the UK's largest court reporting database
items.title_zh: 司法部下令删除英国最大法院报道数据库
items.summary_en: The UK Ministry of Justice has ordered the deletion of the country’s largest court reporting database, sparking concern over access to legal information and transparency. The move raises questions about data retention policies and the balance between privacy and public right to information. Legal communities worry this could hinder legal research and public scrutiny of judicial processes.
items.summary_zh: 英国司法部已下令删除该国最大的法院报道数据库，引发关于法律信息获取与透明度的担忧。此举引出了数据保留政策及隐私与公众知情权平衡的问题。法律界担心这将妨碍法律研究及公众对司法过程的监督。

items.title_en: Show HN: Micasa – track your house from the terminal
items.title_zh: Show HN：Micasa——在终端追踪你的房屋
items.summary_en: Micasa provides a terminal-centric way to monitor and track your home, aggregating status data from sensors and devices into a command-line dashboard. It aims at power users who want quick access without a GUI, with easy integrations and local-first design.
items.summary_zh: Micasa 提供一种以终端为中心的家庭监控方式，将传感器与设备数据聚合到命令行仪表板，面向偏好无界面的高阶用户。它强调本地优先与易于集成的设计。

items.title_en: Is Show HN dead? No, but it's drowning
items.title_zh: Show HN 死了吗？不，但正陷入困境
items.summary_en: The popular hacker community feature Show HN is not dead but is experiencing declining engagement and visibility. Factors include increased noise, changing user behavior, and platform evolution making it harder for quality projects to stand out. This signals challenges for niche tech showcases in maintaining relevance amid growing content saturation.
items.summary_zh: 知名黑客社区栏目Show HN虽然未死，但参与度和曝光率正在下降。原因包括信息过载、用户行为改变及平台演进导致优质项目难以脱颖而出。这反映出技术小众展示在内容饱和中保持影响力的挑战。

items.title_en: Terminals should generate the 256-color palette
items.title_zh: 终端应生成 256 色调色板
items.summary_en: A proposal argues terminals should programmatically generate the full 256-color palette instead of relying on fixed mappings, improving color consistency across emulators and applications. Generating the palette at runtime would reduce surprises from differing defaults and make color-aware tooling and themes more portable.
items.summary_zh: 该提议主张终端应在运行时生成完整的 256 色调色板，而不是依赖固定映射，以提升不同模拟器与应用间的颜色一致性。运行时生成色板能减少因默认设置不同产生的意外，使颜色主题和工具更易迁移。
